snippet: The International Cycling Union is in a struggle with the United States Anti-Doping Agency over jurisdiction in the doping case against Lance Armstrong.
abstract: International Cycling Union is in a struggle with the United States Anti-Doping Agency over jurisdiction in the doping case against Lance Armstrong.
lead_paragraph: The International Cycling Union is in a struggle with the United States Anti-Doping Agency over jurisdiction in the doping case against Lance Armstrong.

headline.seo: Lance Armstrong Case Has Usada and Cycling Group at Odds
headline.main: Cycling and Antidoping Groups Clash on Armstrong
headline.print_headline: Cycling and Antidoping Groups Clash on Armstrong
